</div>
Gathering Talents, Connecting Business</strong> is the largest ever event in Singapore for overseas Vietnamese professionals to meet up, network and explore career opportunities with leading corporations and high-profile thinkers in economics, banking & finance, entrepreneurship and policy making from Vietnam.
The event also provides an exclusive opportunity for companies in Vietnam and Singapore to enhance relationship as well as discuss potential partnership for future business plans.
